EmailTemplate.name: Withdrawal (not received) HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: Withdrawal not received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your inquiry regarding your withdrawal.
Your remittance was sent from our Bank Account on xx/xx/xxxx. Transaction ID: xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx.
Please be aware, it can take up to 8 business days for the finance to appear in your account.
Please contact your own bank for further details
We wish you all the best with your investments Stox Support Team
